Scraper module

class Scraper.Scraper

Bases: object

Scraper chooses which scraper to run. Method ‘ChooseScraper’ chooses the scraper.

ChooseScraper(url)

Chooses the scraper based on product url.

Parameters

url – URL of the product

Returns

the stock status information
